kftp?: i cant change the video resolution... anybody?
you'll need to do that in /etc/X11/xorg.conf then restart X
the first resolution listed will be the default
is there any other alternative aside editing that file?
you could run dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg to change it in a menu-driven program.

do you get the splash screen?
is your monitor detected properly? If not you might want to specify the scan rates in xorg.conf as found in your owner's manual or on the web.
